document_data.name: Ali al-Hadd
document_data.mainbody: '''Ali al-Hadd''' was the Sheikh of [[Tajar]] in the [[Pearl Cities]] of [[Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Relationships: Ali maintained a longstanding alliance with Amir [[Bouladin al-Mutajalli]] of the [[House of Sihr]]. Ali's magical advisor, [[Sheera bint Tanar]] was actually his daughter. He did not recognize her publicly.
document_data.History: Ali was tasked by his father with gaining an audience with the [[Grand Caliph]] in [[Huzuz]] to bring light onto the dire situation occurring in Tajar under the oppressive rule of the Sultan who preceded Kori.
